thread.title: Guy Hands to Start Sharing Terra Firma Ownership in Succession Plan
thread.title_full: Guy Hands to Start Sharing Terra Firma Ownership in Succession Plan - WSJ

author: Simon Clark
title: Guy Hands to Start Sharing Terra Firma Ownership in Succession Plan
text:
British private equity pioneer Guy Hands said he would share ownership of buyout firm Terra Firma Capital Partners Ltd. for the first time with Justin King, former chief executive officer of J Sainsbury PLC, who is joining as vice chairman, as part of a succession plan.
Mr. Hands and Mr. King intend to raise a new buyout fund for Terra Firma, which last raised a €5.4 billion ($6 billion) fund in 2007. The new fund will target €2... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
